children: pāṭihāriyakathānantaraṃ ādipāṭihāriyabhūtassa iddhipāṭihāriyasaṅgahitassa samasīsibhāvassa iddhipāṭihāriyabhāvadīpanatthaṃ ñāṇakathāya niddiṭṭhāpi samasīsakathā iddhipāṭihāriyasambandhena puna kathitā. Tassā atthavaṇṇanā tattha kathitāyevāti.
innerText: 33. Idāni pāṭihāriyakathānantaraṃ ādipāṭihāriyabhūtassa iddhipāṭihāriyasaṅgahitassa samasīsibhāvassa iddhipāṭihāriyabhāvadīpanatthaṃ ñāṇakathāya niddiṭṭhāpi samasīsakathā iddhipāṭihāriyasambandhena puna kathitā. Tassā atthavaṇṇanā tattha kathitāyevāti.
